data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moussallem, M., Ribeiro-Costa, C. S., Caron, E. (2014): Review of Solier's Mecorhopalus species (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae). Zootaxa 3852 (5): 540-552, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.5.2
